name: Escape Black Orion VR
description: In Escape Black Orion you are in a mysterious facility, Black Orion. Something has gone wrong and now you are locked in the engineering bay with gas pouring into the room. Using you wits and whatever tools you can find you must disengage the door locks to escape before your air runs out.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
